scenes.background: Monica raises an eyebrow and looks at Bob skeptically.
scenes.description: Combining both ideas sounds chaotic. How do you see this working out?

options.text: We could have a structured plan to keep things organized.
options.analysis: You offered a solution to maintain organization, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: It's about trying to make everyone happy. We can figure it out together.
options.analysis: You focused on inclusivity and teamwork, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe it's too complicated. We should choose one idea and stick to it.
options.analysis: You suggested simplifying the plan, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
